name: Shovel Knight: Plague of Shadows
description:
Shovel Knight: Plague of Shadows is an arcade game developed by Yacht Club Games. It came out on 17-09-2015. It was published by Yacht Club Games. On review aggregator Metacritic, Shovel Knight: Plague of Shadows has a score of 86. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Shovel Knight: Plague of Shadows on PC, PlayStation 3, Xbox One and Wii U.
